system.description:
On Resound 5+, you can utter incantations and bleed yourself and then ululate to the ancestors.

You can spend 2 Beats to heal all allies to max HP, even those that are Defeated (bringing them out of Defeat). You must make an offering to the ancestors sometime afterward, else suffer the ire of heaven.
system.flavor: Lunas is the panacea, made up of 20 different herb leaves, 15 animal blood parts, 13 moth, butterfly, and dragonfly wings, and 8 different healing waters from 8 different springs, placed within a clay jarlet engraved with the name of the healing diwata that helped the Mender that brewed this lunas.
